Text.val: 01.08.2014 AS SCR#18275 Dropped support for old EH message format ()
05.05.2014 AS SCR#18875 EHBU identifier is now always read from .INI
06.11.2013 JH SCR18431 Removed old link handling (GSET 1200)
28.11.2012 AS SCR#17739 fixed problem with parameter po.FL_Request_ID which was not returned
01.11.2012 AS SCR#17441 reading parameters from XML Blob and returning XML response
22.11.2011 AS SCR#16883 added support for CustomerListRetrieveServiceV2
read input parameters from XML Blob ...
05.05.2014 AS SCR#18875 EHBU identifier is now always read from .INI
the programs which do/did call the old interface do check nHeader ...
Originally we passed the parameters for the program as regular parameters but this raises problems with
Unicode when platforms of client and server differ in byte endianess (like Windows and AS/400 do)
To avoid thes problems we do now pass the parameters as UTF-8 XML Blob from where we read
